about.title: About Us
about.historyP1: Since 2014, we have helped online fashion retailers sell more. Sizebay was born to solve one of the industry's biggest challenges: finding the right size.
about.historyP2: We combine anthropometry, fashion, statistics, and technology to create Size & Fit – a tool that reduces returns and increases confidence at the time of purchase.
about.expertiseP: We operate at the intersection of fashion, technology, and performance. AI, e-commerce, textiles – we combine technical knowledge and strategic vision to deliver real results.
about.globalP1: We serve stores in 60+ countries, with solutions in 30+ languages. Our systems are secure, scalable, and compliant with major data regulations.

questions.question: How does Sizebay's measurement system work?
questions.answer: Our system uses artificial intelligence to analyze user measurements and recommend the ideal size based on historical data from similar products.

questions.question: Does Sizebay work for all types of products?
questions.answer: Yes! We currently offer solutions for clothing, footwear, and accessories, with specific algorithms for each product category.

questions.question: How can I integrate Sizebay into my e-commerce?
questions.answer: Integration is simple and fast. Our technical team accompanies you throughout the entire process, from implementation to team training.

questions.question: What is the accuracy of size recommendations?
questions.answer: Our technology has over 95% accuracy in recommendations, significantly reducing exchanges and returns.

questions.question: Does the system work on mobile devices?
questions.answer: Yes! Sizebay is fully responsive and works perfectly on smartphones, tablets, and desktops.
